pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geopolitical Volatility (GEOVOL) Modelling // Simulation, estimation and inference for the geopolitical volatility (GEOVOL) model of Engle and Campos-Martins (2020) doi:10.2139/ssrn.3685213, where GEOVOL is modelled as a latent multiplicative volatility factor with heterogeneous factor loadings. Estimation is carried out as a maximization- maximization procedure, where GEOVOL and the GEOVOL loadings are estimated iteratively until convergence.
